channel.title: Half life 1 Detail Project
channel.description:
Hello, i'm planning to make a package for Half life 1 to give it an even better look than normal :-). I'm not changing the maps, so they can still be played online as normal. The textures are in a resolution of 512x512 for the standard maps and will also add the best weapon- and playermodels i find. i have made a video with my work in progress stuff on youtube, but it also is a fragvideo. (it's available in HD) in the end are a few screenshots again this is only for the textures, not for the models so far. [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ia6_vFb7n_Q[/url]
[img]https://img97.imageshack.us/img97/1551/detailsky.jpg[/img]
[img]https://img697.imageshack.us/img697/4410/detail111.jpg[/img]
would someone looking forward to it?

item.title: Half life 1 Detail Project
item.dc:creator: Tebe
item.description:
Alles_Ratten:

It’s a bit lame just to say that I use an aimbot, or? because i of course don’t

You should probably take that as a compliment.

Read full topic

item.title: Half life 1 Detail Project
item.dc:creator: Alles_Ratten
item.description:
i have actually only made crossfire so far but it already changes things on other maps of course, so i have to make that fit and still replace many textures on other maps.

item.title: Half life 1 Detail Project
item.dc:creator: Alles_Ratten
item.description:
Yes sure, I will use models that fit to the original weapons.

btw…
It’s a bit lame just to say that I use an aimbot, or? because i of course don’t

item.title: Half life 1 Detail Project
item.dc:creator: Deimos
item.description:
As long as the models change to the original but HD weapons (not a desert eagle for a 357) it’d be cool.

Also the multiplayer gameplay has to be aimbot.

item.title: Half life 1 Detail Project
item.dc:creator: Alles_Ratten
item.description:
Hello,
i’m planning to make a package for Half life 1 to give it an even better look than normal :-).
I’m not changing the maps, so they can still be played online as normal.
The textures are in a resolution of 512x512 for the standard maps and will also add the best weapon- and playermodels i find.
i have made a video with my work in progress stuff on youtube, but it also is a fragvideo. (it’s available in HD)
in the end are a few screenshots again
this is only for the textures, not for the models so far.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ia6_vFb7n_Q

would someone looking forward to it?
